snowflake:position-deletes:v2.notes: Position deletes supported for externally managed Iceberg tables only. Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write exclusively.
caveats: Only supported when reading externally managed Iceberg tables
Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write and never produce position deletes
Perform regular compaction to remove old delete files for best read performance

snowflake:position-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:equality-deletes:v2.notes: Row-level equality deletes explicitly not supported per official documentation. Snowflake supports position deletes only.
caveats: Equality deletes not supported
Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write for DELETE operations

snowflake:equality-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:merge-on-read:v2.notes: Merge-on-read supported for externally managed tables via ENABLE_ICEBERG_MERGE_ON_READ parameter. Snowflake-managed tables use copy-on-write exclusively.
caveats: Only for externally managed Iceberg tables
Requires ENABLE_ICEBERG_MERGE_ON_READ parameter set to TRUE
Snowflake-managed tables always use copy-on-write

snowflake:merge-on-read:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:copy-on-write:v2.notes: Copy-on-write is the exclusive write strategy for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables. All DELETE, UPDATE, and MERGE operations rewrite affected data files.
caveats: Default and only mode for Snowflake-managed tables
Can be enabled for externally managed tables by setting ENABLE_ICEBERG_MERGE_ON_READ to FALSE

snowflake:copy-on-write:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Full schema evolution supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables including add, drop, rename, and reorder columns.
caveats: Schema evolution applies to Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables
Externally managed tables have schema controlled by the external catalog

snowflake:schema-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:column-default-values:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v2.notes: Nanosecond timestamps are a V3 feature. Snowflake supports microsecond precision per the Iceberg V2 specification.

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg partition transforms (year, month, day, hour, truncate, bucket, identity). Bucket transform impacts query performance.
caveats: Bucket partition transform may negatively impact query performance
Partition evolution not supported for Snowflake-managed tables

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:partition-evolution:v2.notes: Partition evolution not supported for Snowflake-managed tables. Supported for externally managed tables if done with an external engine.
caveats: Not supported for Snowflake-managed tables - must drop and recreate table
Supported for externally managed tables when evolution is done externally

snowflake:partition-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v2.notes: Multi-argument transforms are a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:time-travel:v2.notes: Time travel fully supported via DATA_RETENTION_TIME_IN_DAYS parameter. Query historical snapshots within the retention period.
caveats: Retention period configurable via DATA_RETENTION_TIME_IN_DAYS
For externally managed tables, time travel depends on periodic refresh completing before snapshot expiry

snowflake:time-travel:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:table-maintenance:v2.notes: Automatic table optimization for Snowflake-managed tables: data compaction, manifest compaction, snapshot expiry. Orphan file deletion NOT supported.
caveats: Automatic data compaction (can be disabled)
Automatic manifest compaction (cannot be disabled)
Automatic snapshot expiry (cannot be disabled)
Orphan file deletion NOT supported - contact Snowflake Support

snowflake:table-maintenance:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:branching-tagging:v2.notes: Iceberg branching and tagging features are not mentioned as supported in Snowflake documentation.

snowflake:branching-tagging:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:read-support:v2.notes: Full read support for Iceberg tables in Parquet format. Supports both Snowflake-managed and externally managed tables.
caveats: Only Parquet file format supported
Parquet files with unsigned integer logical type not supported

snowflake:read-support:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:write-insert:v2.notes: INSERT INTO fully supported for Snowflake-managed tables. Write support for externally managed tables via REST catalog is GA.
caveats: Full support for Snowflake-managed tables
Externally managed tables support writes via Iceberg REST catalog (GA Oct 2025)

snowflake:write-insert:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v2.notes: MERGE, UPDATE, DELETE, and TRUNCATE fully supported for Snowflake-managed tables using copy-on-write. Also supported for externally managed tables via REST catalog.
caveats: All DML operations use copy-on-write for Snowflake-managed tables
Externally managed tables support position deletes (not equality deletes)

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:catalog-integration:v2.notes: Supports multiple catalog integrations: Snowflake Open Catalog (Polaris), REST Catalog, AWS Glue, and object storage metadata files.
caveats: Snowflake can serve as its own Iceberg catalog for managed tables
External catalogs supported via catalog integrations

snowflake:catalog-integration:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:hive-metastore:v2.notes: Hive Metastore is not a supported catalog integration for Snowflake Iceberg tables.

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v2.notes: AWS Glue supported as an external catalog via REST catalog integration. Read and write access available.
caveats: Dropping externally managed table through Snowflake doesn't delete underlying files (AWS Glue specific)

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:rest-catalog:v2.notes: Full support for Iceberg REST Catalog protocol. Enables read and write access to externally managed tables.
caveats: Write support for externally managed tables requires REST catalog
External catalogs that don't conform to REST protocol not supported for writes

links.label: Configure catalog integration for REST catalogs

snowflake:rest-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:nessie:v2.notes: Nessie catalog is not a supported catalog integration for Snowflake Iceberg tables.

snowflake:polaris:v2.notes: Snowflake Open Catalog is built on Apache Polaris. Native integration with full read and write support.
caveats: Snowflake Open Catalog is Snowflake's managed service built on Polaris
Can sync Snowflake-managed tables with Open Catalog for third-party engine access

links.label: Configure catalog integration for Snowflake Open Catalog

snowflake:polaris:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:unity-catalog:v2.notes: Can access Unity Catalog Iceberg tables via REST Catalog API. CTAS not supported when Unity Catalog is remote catalog.
caveats: Access via REST Catalog API
CREATE TABLE AS SELECT not supported with Unity Catalog as remote catalog

snowflake:unity-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:hadoop-catalog:v2.notes: Hadoop catalog is not a supported catalog integration for Snowflake Iceberg tables.

snowflake:jdbc-catalog:v2.notes: JDBC catalog is not a supported catalog integration for Snowflake Iceberg tables.

snowflake:table-creation:v2.notes: CREATE ICEBERG TABLE supported for Snowflake-managed tables and externally managed tables via catalog integrations.
caveats: Snowflake-managed tables require external volume and base location
External catalog tables require catalog integration
Can create from Iceberg metadata files, Delta files, or REST catalog

snowflake:table-creation:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:variant-type:v2.notes: Variant Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:variant-type:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:shredded-variant:v2.notes: Shredded Variant is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:shredded-variant:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:geometry-type:v2.notes: Geometry Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:geometry-type:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:vector-type:v2.notes: Vector Type is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:vector-type:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:cdc-support:v2.notes: CDC Support is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:cdc-support:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:lineage:v2.notes: Lineage is a V3 feature not available in Iceberg V2.

snowflake:lineage:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:statistics:v2.notes: Column-level statistics (min/max, null counts) written to manifest files for Snowflake-managed tables and used for scan planning.
caveats: Statistics managed automatically for Snowflake-managed tables
Externally managed tables retain statistics from originating engine

snowflake:statistics:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:bloom-filters:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Iceberg bloom filters. Uses proprietary micro-partition pruning and search optimization instead.

snowflake:bloom-filters:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.

snowflake:type-promotion:v2.notes: Type promotion supported per Iceberg spec: int to long, float to double, increasing decimal precision. Metadata-only operation.
caveats: Only for Snowflake-managed tables
Existing data files not rewritten

snowflake:type-promotion:v3.notes: Snowflake supports Iceberg V1 and V2 only. V3 support not yet announced.
